summary: Add eq=True and unsafe_hash=True to Todo dataclass for proper equality comparison and hashability

implementation.approach: Added eq=True and unsafe_hash=True to @dataclass decorator

acceptance_criteria_met: Two Todo objects with same id, text, done, created_at, updated_at are considered equal
Todo objects can be used in sets and as dict keys
Tests can use assert todo1 == todo2 instead of comparing individual fields
